Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "I used to be an adventurer like you. Then I took an arrow in the knee..."

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Let me guess... someone stole your sweetroll."

Dialogue: "Citizen."

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Disrespect the law, and you disrespect me."

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "What do you need?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Trouble?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "What is it?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "No lollygaggin'."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "My cousin's out fighting dragons, and what do I get? Guard duty."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Gotta keep my eyes open. Damn dragons could swoop down at any time."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Fear not. Come dragon or giant, we'll be ready."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "They say Helgen got hit by a dragon. One of those horrors comes here, we'll be ready."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Brigands I can handle, but this talk of dragons? World's gone mad, I say."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Everything's in order."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Staying safe I hope."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Everything all right?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Helgen... destroyed by a dragon. Hard to believe, isn't it?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Could sure use a warm bed right about now..."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "I'd be a lot warmer and a lot happier with a bellyful of mead..."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "I mostly deal with petty thievery and drunken brawls. Been too long since we've had a good bandit raid."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "What is it? Dragons?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Watch the skies, traveler."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "They say Ulfric Stormcloak murdered the High King... with his voice! Shouted him apart!"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "No matter what else happens, the guards will always be grateful for everything you've done."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Yes, Dovahkiin? How can I help you?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Whatever you need, Dragonborn. Just say the word."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road
Condition: the Player uses their dragon shout.

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "I fear the night. Because the werewolves and vampires don't."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Bit late to be wandering around, isn't it?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Only burglars and vampires creep around after dark. So which are you?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "You hear that? I swear, there's something out there. In the dark."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "I hope you're finding the city in proper order, thane."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road
Condition: the Player is thane of the hold

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "I trust the day's found you well, thane."
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road
Condition: the Player is thane of the hold

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "How do you do, thane?"
Event: the Player passing next to a guard on the road
Condition: the Player is thane of the hold

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Just a few more hours and I can crawl under some furs..."

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Jarl's been looking for someone who ain't superstitious though. Be lookin' for a fool if you ask me."

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "It's bad luck to talk about that place."

Condition: that the guard is a Morthal Guard and is asked about the burned house

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "You should talk to the Jarl up in Dragonsreach, lend any aid you can."

Dialogue: "Stormcloaks, Imperials, dragons. Ain't no matter to me what I kill. Let them come."

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "By the Gods! What manner of power is that?"

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "It is the power of old! The Voice of the Dragonborn!"
Event: a Guard reacting to witnessed events
Condition: the Player uses a non-aggressive dragon shout in front of a guard.

Dialogue: "The Thu'um! He/She summons the Thu'um!"

Speaker: Guard
Dialogue: "Alright now. Everyone back away. Let the law handle this."
